title: Fire Blows Pack 1
description: Fire blow sound effects related to fire torches, burning sticks
longDescription:
(UPDATE RELEASE)


LISTEN TO THE WATERMARKED AUDIO DEMO

Preview link to v2

Preview link to v1


***PACK CONTAINS SOUNDS FROM BOTH VERSIONS***


Introducing “Fire Blows Pack 1” – the ultimate collection of high-fidelity sound effects designed to bring the heat to your epic video game adventures.


  1. For those who have already purchased this pack, please download this free update, v2, in which we have added a total of 231 incredible new fire blows in two audio specifications: 96kHz/24bit and 44.1kHz/24bit.
  2. V2 includes variations ranging from simple fire blows or whooshes to complex, whirling, fluttering, and long fire sounds.
  3. The sounds of v2 are completely different tonality from that of the original v1 sounds.
  4. The pack contains both versions properly organized (v2 is Available in 96kHz/24bit and 44.1kHz/24bit and v1 in 44.1kHz/16bit)
  5. Where v1 is suitable for simple games, the v2 sounds are for AAA RPG games.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS - 746

Number of Audio Waves: 515 + 231 + 231

Number of Audio Cues: 515 + 231 + 231

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz/24bit + 44.1kHz/24bit + 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Stereo

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 17:55 ( of v1) + 20:56 (of v2)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
v2 details:
1- Added 231 new sounds in v2
2- Removed 55 sounds from v1 (now 460 sounds)
3- v1 sounds renamed
4- Added some stereo width to the sounds
